SEARCH
Package com.bobocode.bring.web.server

Class WebServerConfiguration

java.lang.Object
com.bobocode.bring.web.server.WebServerConfiguration
public class WebServerConfiguration extends Object
Configuration class for setting up and customizing the web server and related beans.

The WebServerConfiguration class is responsible for defining beans related to the embedded web server, object mapping, error handling.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Blyzhnytsia Team

  • Method Details

    • tomcatServletWebServerFactory

      public TomcatServletWebServerFactory tomcatServletWebServerFactory()
      Creates and returns a TomcatServletWebServerFactory bean for configuring the embedded Tomcat web server. The port and context path are obtained from the ServerProperties bean.
      Returns:
      a configured instance of TomcatServletWebServerFactory
      See Also:
      • TomcatServletWebServerFactory

    • objectMapper

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper()
      Creates and returns an ObjectMapper bean for JSON object mapping.
      Returns:
      a configured instance of ObjectMapper

    • prepareErrorResponseCreator

      public ErrorResponseCreator prepareErrorResponseCreator()
      Creates and returns an ErrorResponseCreator bean for preparing error responses.
      Returns:
      a new instance of ErrorResponseCreator
      See Also:
      • ErrorResponseCreator

    • jsonExceptionHandler

      public JsonExceptionHandler jsonExceptionHandler()
      Creates and returns a JsonExceptionHandler bean for handling JSON exceptions. This bean is configured with an ObjectMapper and ServerProperties.
      Returns:
      a new instance of JsonExceptionHandler
      See Also:
      • JsonExceptionHandler
